name: VR SkyRoller
description:
Unique rollercoaster experience in a full VR 3D surrounding.
Aim at start button to start the ride.

Featured:

- 2:00 min Ride.
- Ride amongst birds and airplanes.
- Extreme Rollercoaster ride.
- No controller needed.

If you like VR Games enter my page to download more VR games !
http://www.wingsgames.com
